name: parentally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to parents or to being a parent: All participants under 18 years of age must provide a parentally signed consent form. They dropped out of university, giving up the idea of parentally approved careers to become one of the most successful bands in the country.
More examplesFewer examplesParentally bereaved teenagers tend to take on the responsibility of supporting the remaining parent.These student grants are parentally means tested.Parentally condoned absence accounts for around 50–75 percent of non-excused absence from schools.
